subject: Re: [junit] Query regarding Regarding Mock Objects
msgSnippet: ... Yes. I prefer not to express what my reaction must mean about my perspective. :) -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services
messageBody:
Chappell, Simon P wrote:

> J.B.
>
> >And sometimes programmers do silly things. I just wanted to know which
> >it was. Sometimes the mere act of asking such a question makes the
> >programmer think, "Wow, that /is/ silly."
>
> Interesting difference in our reactions. You assumed that it was most
> likely a typo and I assumed that they were following corporate
> guidelines. (Perhaps the fact that I work for UberMegaGlobalCorporation
> Inc. has something to do with my perspective and default assumptions? ;-)

Yes. I prefer not to express what my reaction must mean about my
perspective. :)
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
